org.activebpel.work
Class AeWorkManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.work.AeWorkManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeConfigChangeListener, IAeStoppableWorkManager, java.lang.Runnable, commonj.work.WorkManager
public class AeWorkManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements commonj.work.WorkManager, java.lang.Runnable, IAeConfigChangeListener, IAeStoppableWorkManager

Implementation of the WorkManager for Application Servers spec from IBM/BEA. Provides a facility for scheduling asynchronous operations in the form of Work objects.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAll
          Waits for one or all of the work items within its collection to finish before calling its notify() method which will notify the calling thread from either waitForAll or waitForAny.
protected  class AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAny
          Extends the wait for all routine to notify when any of the objects within the coll have completed.

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from interface: IAeStoppableWorkManager
Signals the work manager to stop. If the dispatch thread is currently running it'll be interrupted.

Specified by:
stop in interface IAeStoppableWorkManager
See Also:
IAeStoppableWorkManager.stop()

done

public void done(AeWorkerThread aThread)
Callback method from the worker thread for when it's done executing its work. Each time a thread completes we walk the collection of waiting objects to see if any of them are able to continue.

Parameters:
aThread -

run

public void run()
The runnable target for the dispatch thread. The run method will execute until the workmanager is shutdown.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
See Also:

schedule

public commonj.work.WorkItem schedule(commonj.work.Work aWork,
                                      commonj.work.WorkListener aListener)
                               throws commonj.work.WorkException,
                                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Schedules the work and returns the work item immediately. The dispatch thread for the work manager will assign a thread to the newly queued work when one becomes available.

Specified by:

createWorkItem

private AeWorkItem createWorkItem(commonj.work.Work aWork)
Creates a work item based on the type of work being done. If it's a serializable work instance then we'll create a remote work item, otherwise it's a regular work item.

Parameters:
aWork -
